short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Screen Reader/ Text to speech tool but in the side panel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
💬 SidePanel Screen Reader: Making Web Browsing Audible & Accessible!

🌐 Easily Accessible:
Just a click away, the SidePanel Screen Reader is your go-to tool for an audible web experience. Activate it directly from the side panel or simply right-click on the text you want to hear, and choose 'Read Website'. It's that easy!

🔊 Diverse Voice Options:
Personalize your listening experience with a choice of over 20 voices. 

⚙️ Customizable Listening:
Tailor your audio experience with adjustable settings. Control the rate, pitch, and volume of the voice to suit your listening needs.

🌍 Language Inclusive:
The reader supports multiple languages. This feature not only enhances accessibility but also makes it a handy tool for language learners and enthusiasts.
